point1: With over 2 years of professional experience in software development, Rajvardhan Singh Chib has honed his skills as a React Native Developer and Web Developer, with a strong background in building scalable and efficient applications.
point2: Notably, Rajvardhan developed and deployed a feature-rich React Native app for Horizon View, utilizing NativeWind for seamless styling and WatermelonDB for efficient data management, showcasing his expertise in leveraging innovative technologies.
point3: Rajvardhan's technical strengths lie in his proficiency in React, React Native, Node.js, and MongoDB, as well as his experience with Redux, SCSS, and Firebase, making him a versatile and skilled developer.
point4: With a keen understanding of the tech industry, Rajvardhan possesses expertise in building robust web applications, utilizing front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and staying up-to-date with the latest tools and technologies.
point5: What sets Rajvardhan apart is his ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, adapt to evolving technologies, and consistently deliver high-quality results, making him a valuable asset to any organization.
